metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17581 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
CiffDirectory::readDirectory() at crwimage_int.cpp in Exiv2 0.26 hasexcessive stack consumption due to a recursive function, leading to Denialof service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.3
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.3').
